title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13 ยง 52.9 - Amendment of notice of hearing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13 ยง 52.9 - Amendment of notice of hearing

State Regulations

The notice of hearing may be amended upon application by the trial examiner to the
hearing officer at any time prior to the conclusion of the hearing. If such application is granted, the hearing officer may, in his discretion, grant
additional time to the registrant for further preparation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13
ยง
52.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
